title: [情报] 乐高21107 新set: 终界
author: 王先生007
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2014-3-21 21:08 编辑 

写在前面
 第一次发新闻还真是有点兴奋啊 





74e9357adab44aed5d842d5ab11c8701a38bfbbc.png (95.99 KB, 下载次数: 23)

下载附件

2014-3-21 20:06 上传




       LEGO has published a photo of the forthcoming Minecraft set 21107The End on Facebook, which shows it with designer Steen Sig Andersen.
It looks nothing like the other micro world sets and frankly, it's a little bit weird. No doubt Minecraft players will recognise it though, and can tell us if it's a faithful representation

个人扯淡：
乐高在facebook发表了新set：Minecraft一张照片，set编号为21107
乐高公司早在前几年就发布了三套关于minecraft的set 
之前一直都在官网征集图纸  真希望这次能快点出啊
转自http://www.brickset.com/
